faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions - Try on hairstyle
faq.description: Have questions about our AI hairstyle online free tool and haircut simulator? We've got answers.

items.title: How does the virtual hairstyle try on work?
items.description: Our AI-powered haircut simulator uses advanced algorithms to map hairstyles onto your uploaded photo, creating realistic transformations for a virtual hairstyle try-on and helping you discover what hairstyle suits you best with AI Hairstyle Changer.

items.title: Can I really Try on hairstyle for free?
items.description: Yes! AI Hairstyle Changer is completely free to use. You can try on haircuts and experiment with different looks through our virtual hair style generator without any cost, including free men hairstyle online options.

items.title: How to Use the AI Hairstyle Try-On API?
items.description: 1. Register as a developer. 2. Create an application and obtain an API key. 3. Follow the Hairstyle Changer API documentation to integrate and build your own virtual haircut generator that lets users Try on hairstyle with their picture for free.

items.title: Can I use my own photo?
items.description: Absolutely! Upload your photo to preview hairstyles with our haircut simulator. Our virtual hair style generator works best with clear, front-facing photos to show you what hairstyle suits me best.

items.title: Is this suitable for both men and women?
items.description: Yes, our free men and women hairstyle online tool includes styles for all genders. Whether you're looking for virtual hair style men options or trendy women's styles, we've got you covered to try on haircuts that fit you perfectly.

items.title: How do I try on hairstyle for men or women?
items.description: Open the editor, upload a clear front-facing photo, and click Try On Hairstyle to preview styles. You can also browse looks in our virtual hair style gallery powered by the hair style generator.

items.title: Does the tool support face shapes when I try on hairstyle?
items.description: Yes. When you Try On Hairstyle, our system suggests options by face shape and length. The virtual hair style recommendations come from our trained hair style generator.

items.title: Can I try on hairstyle without signing up?
items.description: Yes. You can Try On Hairstyle as a guest. The virtual hair style experience works instantly, and our hair style generator processes your photo in seconds.

items.title: Is the try on hairstyle result realistic?
items.description: We aim for photorealistic previews. The Try On Hairstyle pipeline aligns hair edges and lighting. Our hair style generator blends colors for a natural virtual hair style outcome.

items.title: How to change hair color while I try on hairstyle?
items.description: Select a color chip and click Try On Hairstyle again. The hair style generator re-renders the shade, keeping volume and shape for a consistent virtual hair style.

items.title: Can I download the try on hairstyle preview?
items.description: Yes, use the Download button. Each Try On Hairstyle render is generated by our hair style generator and is suitable for sharing in a virtual hair style moodboard.

items.title: What photo rules improve my try on hairstyle results?
items.description: Use a sharp, front-facing photo with even lighting. This helps the Try On Hairstyle engine and the hair style generator produce clean virtual hair style results.

items.title: Is there a mobile-friendly way to try on hairstyle?
items.description: Absolutely. Tap Upload to Try On Hairstyle on mobile. The virtual hair style flow and the hair style generator are optimized for small screens.

items.title: How does the API let users try on hairstyle?
items.description: Integrate our endpoints to let users Try On Hairstyle in your app. The hair style generator powers a programmable virtual hair style experience.

items.title: What makes your try on hairstyle different?
items.description: Edge-aware rendering and color realism. Our Try On Hairstyle stack pairs diffusion with a tuned hair style generator to deliver a consistent virtual hair style preview.
